name: Nan Zhang 0004
content: Nan Zhang | Penn State website Nan Zhang Professor of Information Sciences & Technology, Penn State University Contact & Basic Info Selected PublicationsSee dblp ❐ for more Selected Services Teaching Contact Westgate E357 College of Information Sciences and Technology The Pennsylvania State University University Park, PA 16802 (814) 863-9463 (office) | nan@ist.psu.edu [ LinkedIn ❐ ] [ dblp ❐ ] Basic Info Before joining Penn State in August 2017, I was a Professor of Computer Science at The George Washington University, Washington DC. From January 2016 to August 2017, I served as a Program Director at the National Science Foundation, with responsibilities in the Information Integration and Informatics (III), Secure and Trustworthy Cyberspace (SaTC), and BIGDATA programs. I received my Ph.D. from Texas A&M University in 2006 and my B.S. from Peking University, China in 2001, both in computer science. My research focuses on data analytics and information privacy/security, and is currently supported by National Science Foundation, Army Research Office, and Qatar Foundation. My work has received several awards, including the NSF CAREER award in 2008, Best Paper Awards from IEEE ICC 2013 and IEEE NAS 2010, the Best Student Paper Award from ACM CIKM 2013, and a Best Paper Nomination from IEEE ISI 2015. My work on technology transfer was also recognized by the GW Technology Transfer Innovation Price and the first place finish at the GW Business Plan Competition, both in 2012. Please see my dblp ❐ page for other publications. Selected Recent Professional Services Associate Editor, IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering, 2016 - now Finance Chair, ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD 2018) Program Co-Chair, International Conference on Web-Age Information Management (WAIM 2016) Poster & Demo Co-Chair, ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security (CCS 2012) Mentorship Co-Chair, ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD 2012) Review broad member for Proceedings of the VLDB Endowment (PVLDB 2016, 2017) Program Committee member for ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD 2019), ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (KDD 2018), IEEE International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE 2018), etc. Teaching I am teaching IST 597: "Web Data Analytics" in Spring, 2018. Previously, I taught the following undergraduate and graduate courses at GWU and UTA: PSU Graduate: Data Privacy and Security GWU Undergraduate: Database Systems & Team Projects (including social, legal and ethical impact of computing) GWU Undergraduate/Graduate: Network Security GWU Undergraduate/Graduate: Computer Networks GWU Graduate: Database Systems I GWU Graduate: Data Management and Exploration on the Web UTA Undergraduate: Database Systems UTA Undergraduate/Graduate: Information Security II UTA Graduate: Data Mining UTA Graduate: Data Security and Privacy © 2008-2017 Nan Zhang
